verses.verse: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> upon him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> to <S%H2590>embalm<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: and the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> for him; for so are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of those which are <S%H2590>embalmed<s%>: and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H1058>mourned<s%> for him threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>. mourned: Heb. wept

And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H1068>mourning<s%> were <S%H5674>past<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If now I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%>, I pray you, in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

My <S%H1>father<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2009>Lo<s%>, I <S%H4191>die<s%>: in my <S%H6913>grave<s%> which I have <S%H3738>digged<s%> for me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, there shalt thou bury <S%H6912>me<s%>. Now therefore let me go <S%H5927>up<s%>, I pray thee, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and I will come <S%H7725>again<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, according as he made thee <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: and with him went <S%H5927>up<s%> all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,

And all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: only their little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and their <S%H1241>herds<s%>, they <S%H5800>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>.
And there went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him both <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>: and it was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H4264>company<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad<s%>, which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and there they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>sore<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation<s%>: and he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H60>mourning<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H60>mourning<s%> in the <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%>, This is a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>: wherefore the name of <S%H8034>it<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H67>Abelmizraim<s%>, which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>. Abelmizraim: that is, The mourning of the Egyptians
And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto him according as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them:

For his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> him into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%>, which <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> with the <S%H7704>field<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a <S%H6913>buryingplace<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, he, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and all that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him to <S%H6912>bury<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>.

And when <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> will <S%H3863>peradventure<s%> hate <S%H7852>us<s%>, and will <S%H7725>certainly<s%> <S%H7725>requite<s%> us all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which we <S%H1580>did<s%> unto him.

And they sent a <S%H6680>messenger<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thy <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he <S%H4194>died<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, sent: Heb. charged

So shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H5375>Forgive<s%>, I pray <S%H577>thee<s%> now, the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and their <S%H2403>sin<s%>; for they <S%H1580>did<s%> unto thee <S%H7451>evil<s%>: and now, we pray thee, <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> when they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him.
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> also <S%H3212>went<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> before his <S%H6440>face<s%>; and they <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, we be thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for am I in the place of <S%H430>God<s%>?

But as for you, ye <S%H2803>thought<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against me; but <S%H430>God<s%> meant <S%H2803>it<s%> unto <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H4616>to<s%> bring to <S%H6213>pass<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye not: I will <S%H3557>nourish<s%> you, and your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>. And he <S%H5162>comforted<s%> them, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3820>kindly<s%> unto them. kindly: Heb. to their hearts

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, he, and his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8029>third<s%> generation: the <S%H1121>children<s%> also of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> were brought <S%H3205>up<s%> upon <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1290>knees<s%>. brought: Heb. born

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, I <S%H4191>die<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> you, and bring you <S%H5927>out<s%> of this <S%H776>land<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>sware<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>visit<s%> you, and ye shall carry <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> from <S%H2088>hence<s%>.

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, being an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>: and they <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> him, and he was <S%H3455>put<s%> in a <S%H727>coffin<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
